value: FRAME have come to preview a site specifically built for a release event for their new song.
So we’re already through this far with our preview. I’m glad we got to talk to the staff members､ too.
joy
I’m already looking forward to the event even now! Let’s make it a good live no matter what!
You told them that there are no particular plans after this､ so they’re free to split up and do their own thing.
I see. I have somewhere I want to visit､ but what are you two going to do?
normal
Ah､ I also have to go buy stuff since I was asked to.
joy
All right､ looks like we’re gonna split up here. Let’s work hard at lessons tomorrow､ too.
normal
(Since I’m already here at the shopping mall､ maybe I should buy something good to bring back home for my family.)
sad
(…Hm? That student’s catching my attention a little. She’s been loitering around the exact same shelf for a while now.)
(Plus､ it’s like she’s been waiting to see how her surroundings are acting…)
normal
Hey. Is there something you’re looking for? Should I call an employee over for you?
……Hh!
sad
—Oh. She left.
angry
(If I hadn’t talked to her then､ she probably would’ve ended up doing something… I’m glad nothing bad happened.)
sad
(But I feel like I remember seeing that kid’s face somewhere before…)
